name: Witch Blast
description:
Introduction

Witch Blast is a free roguelite dungeon crawl shooter heavily inspired from Binding Of Isaac and classic roguelikes (as Nethack or DCSS). The player plays as a novice magician in a dungeon who is trying to get as far as he can, using various items he can find to defeat the inhabitants of the dungeon.

Description

The current playable version features:

  • randomly generated dungeons - 8 levels,
  • various items and potions,
  • gold, chest, shops and keys,
  • traps, monsters and powerful bosses,
  • magic spells with cooldown,
  • different switchable shot types (ice, poison, etc...),
  • temples and divinities with piety level and divine intervention / bonus,
  • achievements and bonus/items unlock,
  • online scores (best players ever, and daily hall of fame),
  • secret rooms,
  • beautiful 2D art, effects and music.
Controls

Standard commands (can be changed in the game):

  • WASD (US, DE) or QSDZ (FR) to move in 8 directions,
  • Arrows to shoot in 4 directions,
  • [Tab] to change shoot type (if you've found any),
  • [Space] to cast a spell (if you've found any),
  • [RShift] to control time (time x2),
  • [E] to interact (buy things, pray at temple, etc...),
  • [1]..[4] to use item 1 .. 4,
  • [LShift] + [1]..[4] to drop item 1 .. 4,
